I was reporting on some startling film news, but for whatever reason everyone went off on their own tangent and made a million threads all over the Space Lounge relating to it. I'd like my thread, which started it all, to be removed before people seriously get annoyed and blame me for it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115136-FNaF-Movie-%21

Terminated.

By the way, you can delete whole threads yourself, if I recall correctly.

If others have posted in a thread, it can't be deleted because that would deprive third parties of their posts. However, the original poster can request that a thread be closed, so this one has been.

And by the way, non-moderators can not delete threads, whether their own or not.

One of you guys (Tao I think) said when responding to a similar move, to either report or to post in here about it, so....

smjjames, "report" is generally for occasions when you find a problem with someone else's submissions. This thread is primarily for asking for help with one's own threads. It's not a hard-and-fast rule, but helps us figure out what we're dealing with.
